Title: An Act Changing the Name of the Celestino Gallares Hospital in the Municipality of Carmen, Province of Bohol, to Congressman Simeon G. Toribio Memorial Hospital
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 318
An Act Changing the Name of the Celestino Gallares Hospital in the Municipality of Carmen, Province of Bohol, to Congressman Simeon G. Toribio Memorial Hospital
Section 1. The name of the Celestino Gallares Hospital in the Municipality of Carmen, Province of Bohol, is changed to Congressman Simeon G. Toribio Memorial Hospital.1awp++i1
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: November 14, 1982
